in the years 80 the prime minister.M of the Great Britain M.T. has destroyed
il sistema sociale. É stata/*stato particularmente dura/*duro con i poveri, che non riuscivono
the system social is been.F/*M particularly harsh.F/*M with the poor who not were able

particularly harsh with the poor, who weren't able to defend themselves.'
